clusters.label: Text Tools
clusters.description: Clean, transform, and analyze text with fast no-login tools.

clusters.label: Developer Tools
clusters.description: Developer utilities for encoding, conversion, and formatting.

clusters.label: JSON Tools

seo.subtitle: Fix copied text formatting, remove paragraph breaks, and join lines instantly.
seo.title: Remove Line Breaks from Text Online | FormatForge
seo.metaDescription: Instantly remove line breaks, paragraph breaks, and weird formatting from text copied from PDFs, Word, or emails. No reload, no login. Paste and fix.

intro: When copying text from PDFs, emails, or Word documents, you often get unwanted line breaks or hard returns inside sentences.
This tool fixes text formatting instantly. Whether you want to join all lines into a single block of text or strictly format paragraphs, it runs entirely in your browser with zero latency.
It is the perfect utility for cleaning up AI-generated output or messy emails before pasting them into your own documents.

howTo.heading: How to remove line breaks
steps: Paste your messy text into the input area.
The tool analyzes your text and removes line breaks instantly.
Copy the cleaned text to your clipboard.

items.input:
This is text
copied from a
PDF document.
items.output: This is text copied from a PDF document.

faq.a: Yes, we offer an option to preserve double line breaks (paragraphs) while removing single line breaks.

faq.q: Is my text saved on a server?
faq.a: No. The formatting is performed completely on your device in your web browser. Nothing is uploaded to any server.
By default, the tool also cleans up excessive whitespace, converting multiple consecutive spaces into a single space.

seo.subtitle: Clean pasted HTML, remove inline styles, or strip HTML tags completely.
seo.title: Clean HTML & Remove Inline Styles Online | FormatForge
seo.metaDescription: Clean messy HTML code instantly. Strip inline CSS, remove unnecessary tags, or extract pure text from HTML snippets. Entirely private and browser-based.

intro: Pasting content from word processors like MS Word or visual page builders often brings along massive amounts of inline CSS and broken HTML tags.
Our HTML cleaner strips out inline styles, classes, and empty tags to give you pure, semantic HTML. It's the perfect pre-processing step for content editors and developers.
If you just want the words, you can use the 'Strip Tags' mode to completely remove all HTML syntax and get pure text.

howTo.heading: How to clean HTML
steps: Select your cleaning mode (Remove formatting vs Strip all tags).

faq.q: Will this tool remove my links?
faq.a: By default, no. We preserve semantic tags like <a>, <strong>, and <em> while removing inline styles. You can opt to strip everything if needed.
It relies on your browser's built-in parser, which automatically tries to fix unclosed tags and basic structural errors before cleaning.
Yes, just like all FormatForge utilities, your HTML is processed completely within your browser and never sent over the internet.

seo.subtitle: Get instant word counts, reading time, sentence length, and character analysis.
seo.title: Free Text Analyzer & Word Counter Online | FormatForge
seo.metaDescription: Analyze your text instantly. Beyond a simple word counter, get character lengths, reading and speaking times, and paragraph analysis directly in your browser.

intro: Witers, students, and SEO professionals need to know more than just a raw word count. Our Text Analyzer gives you deep insights instantaneously.
As you paste or type, we estimate reading time, count sentences and paragraphs, and provide character density without any loading screens.
It handles massive documents efficiently directly in your browser without saving your data anywhere.

howTo.heading: How to analyze text
steps: Simply paste or type your content into the text area.
All statistics update dynamically in real-time.

faq.q: How is the reading time estimated?
faq.a: We use a standard rate of 225 words per minute for silent adult reading.

faq.q: Does it count spaces as characters?
faq.a: We provide two character counts: one that includes all characters (including spaces and punctuation) and one that excludes spaces for specific academic limits.

faq.q: Is there a limit on how much text I can analyze?
faq.a: Because the tool runs entirely in your web browser, there is no hard limit. You can analyze whole book manuscripts seamlessly.

seo.subtitle: Convert text to UPPERCASE, lowercase, Title Case, camelCase, or snake_case instantly.
seo.title: Text Case Converter: Uppercase, Lowercase, Title Case | FormatForge
seo.metaDescription: Easily convert your text between uppercase, lowercase, sentence case, title case, camelCase, and snake_case. Free online case converter tool.

intro: Whether you accidentally left Caps Lock on, need to format a title properly, or are a developer needing camelCase variables, the Case Converter handles it all.
With just one click, transform your entire text block to the precise casing format you need.
Everything occurs instantly with no page reloads, making it the fastest way to fix casing errors.

howTo.heading: How to change text case
steps: Paste the text that needs fixing.
Select the desired case format from the options.
Copy the converted text to your clipboard.

faq.q: Do you support developer formats like camelCase?
faq.a: Yes! Alongside standard grammatical cases, we support camelCase, snake_case, PascalCase, and kebab-case for developers.
Sentence case capitalizes the very first letter of the text, as well as the first letter following any period, exclamation mark, or question mark.
No, you don't need to be online. Once the page is loaded, the case conversion is handled by local JavaScript.

seo.subtitle: Quickly remove duplicate lines from a list to extract unique values.
seo.title: Remove Duplicate Lines from Text Online | FormatForge
seo.metaDescription: Filter out repeated lines from text lists instantly. Paste any list, dedupe lines, keep their original order, and export unique values securely in your browser.

intro: When working with large databases, email lists, SEO keyword exports, or Excel data, you frequently run into duplicate entries.
This tool strips out repeated lines from any list rapidly, leaving you with only unique values. You can choose to maintain the original list order, or sort it alphabetically automatically.
Ideal for data cleanup operations, completely private, and highly optimized for large datasets.

howTo.heading: How to remove duplicates
steps: Paste a list of items, one per line.

faq.a: Yes, by default, the first occurrence of an item is kept in its original place, and any subsequent duplicates are deleted.

faq.q: Is this tool safe for email lists?
faq.a: Absolutely. It runs exclusively on the frontend. Data never touches our servers.
Yes, there is an option to perform case-insensitive deduplication, treating 'Apple' and 'apple' as the same.
